channel.title: Media Studies
channel.description:
Well, I asked my IT teacher whether our school did media studies at all. He said "Yes, we have a Media BTEC," I got home, told my mum and she said "Aint no way you doing a BTEC,". I was wandering, does anybody have any online media GCSE course's?
Oh, if you didn't know, media studies is stuff like photoshop and all that stuff.

a BTEC prepares you for a job more than get you the degrees.

item.title: Media Studies
item.dc:creator: @dragonus18 dragonus18
item.description:
@dragonus18 wrote:

[quote=“killerman93, post:3, topic:164730”][quote author=dragonus18 link=topic=223606.msg1930642#msg1930642 date=1197687276]
wtf is a BTEC?
[/quote]

It’s lower education, if you do a BTEC you can’t get a degree on the subject that’s a BTEC unless your really good at it.[/quote]
ohh thanks for explaining.

Read full topic
